abstract: This paper presents cuSVM, a software package for high-speed Support Vector Machine (SVM) training and prediction that exploits the mas-sively parallel processing power of Graphics Processors (GPUs). cuSVM is written in NVIDIA's CUDA C-language GPU programming environment, in-cludes implementations of both classification and regression, and performs SVM training (prediction) at 13-73 (22-172) times the rate of state of the art CPU software.
